content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/vendor_unquoted.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

-- ESCAPECHAR

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/vendor_escaped.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        ESCAPECHAR = '\\'
    ) AS [result]

-- FIELDCODE

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/vendor.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '"'
    ) AS [result]
